name: express-mongo-crud-rest-example
description: CRUD REST API example with node/express and mongodb

scripts.start: cross-env DEBUG=mira-analytics LOG_LEVEL=debug NODE_ENV=development NODE_PATH=src/ nodemon -r dotenv/config bin/www.js
scripts.debug: cross-env DEBUG=mira-analytics LOG_LEVEL=debug NODE_ENV=development NODE_PATH=src/ nodemon --debug-brk --inspect -r dotenv/config bin/www.js
scripts.test: cross-env DEBUG=mira-analytics LOG_LEVEL=debug NODE_ENV=development NODE_PATH=src/ nodemon -r dotenv/config test/index.js
